asset.title: EBC Ultimax Slotted Rotors Review: AutoAnything Product Demo
asset.description:
Buy EBC Rotors: http://www.autoanything.com/brakes/61A3865A0A0.aspx

EBC Ultimax Slotted Rotors are engineered for high-performance driving and designed to stay quiet under the harshest conditions. These EBC brake rotors have precision cut slots that vent heat, gases and moisture. These EBC Ultimax brake rotors are always backed by a 12 month/10,000 mile warranty.

We carry all EBC brake pads & rotors, buy with confidence, all brake parts include Free Shipping: http://www.autoanything.com/brakes/20A50677A1.aspx
